Class GameStatistic

java.lang.Object

public class GameStatistic
extends Object

Provides useful meta information about the game.

Version:
1.0, 14.10.2011
Author:
Markus Vetsch

getContinuedTime

public String getContinuedTime()
Returns the date and time, at which the Game was continued, if it's been restored from a previous session.

Returns:
The date and time, at which the Game was continued or NULL otherwise.
